## DataViewJSTools.rssReadingTasks() method

Get a list of reading tasks for the given RSS items.

**Signature:**

```typescript
rssReadingTasks(items: TPageRecords, read?: boolean): TTaskRecords;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

items


</td><td>

[TPageRecords](./rss-tracker.tpagerecords.md)


</td><td>

list of RSS items to get the reading tasks for


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

read


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ `false` to return unread items; `true` to return read items. If `undefined` all reading tasks are returned


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[TTaskRecords](./rss-tracker.ttaskrecords.md)

reading tasks matching the given reading status
